full_summary:
### Tender Notification and Specification

#### Overview
The Department of National Defence has issued a tender notice for the procurement of specialized electrical cables. The proposed contract involves the delivery of two types of cables with specific performance and compatibility requirements.

#### Tender Details

*   *RFP ID*: W8482-231194/A
*   *Closing Date*: March 13, 2023, at 14:00 p.m. (Pacific Time)
*   *Location*: Canadian Forces Bases Halifax, Nova Scotia, and Esquimalt, British Columbia

#### Requested Items

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for two lots of electrical cables:

1.  **Item 1**: *Cable, Special Purpose, Electrical* - GSIN: 6145, NSN: 99-5000146
    *   Part number: EPD29633A
    *   Manufacturer: TE CONNECTIVITY LIMITED (NCAGE: K1010)
    *   Quantity: 300 PCS (MR)
    *   Delivery location: Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia
2.  **Item 2**: *Cable, Special Purpose, Electrical* - GSIN: 6145, NSN: 99-5000146
    *   Part number: EPD29633A
    *   Manufacturer: TE CONNECTIVITY LIMITED (NCAGE: K1010)
    *   Quantity: 300 PCS (MR)
    *   Delivery location: Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia

#### Bidding Requirements

*   Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.
*   All bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
*   Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.

#### Submission and Evaluation

*   Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
*   Documents must be attached to the bid submission, and the bid will be evaluated in accordance with the evaluation criteria outlined in the tender documents.

#### Contact Information

For any clarification or support, please contact:

Christopher Cauchi
christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
(555) 555-5555

#### Important links:

*   RFP Document (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/10/cae5d1d4348bd6e930d361b2af3abf15/w848
